member.name: T:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtDatabase
member.summary: Simple text file implementation of . Can be used to mock database access easily. Each SPROC gets its own folder and each combination of parameters its own file.

member.name: M:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtDatabase.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The base folder for the data files.

member.name: T:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader
member.summary: Reader implementation for a bunch of text files - .

member.name: F:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader.fileName
member.summary: The file name of the data file for this result.

member.name: F:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader.fileLines
member.summary: The actual lines of the file. TODO: would be better to read the file line by line - this is for simplicity of the class ... remember: it's a non-productive 'fun' project ;-).

member.name: F:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader.resultIndex
member.summary: The index of the current result set - all data files contain a two-digit-index.

member.name: M:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the file containing the data.

member.name: M:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader.Read
member.returns: A value indicating whether there is still data at this line.

member.name: M:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader.Get``1(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the value of a column by its index.
member.returns: The value of the column in the current row.

member.name: M:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader.Get(System.Int32,System.Type)
member.summary: Reads the value of a column by its index.
member.returns: The value of the column in the current row.

member.name: M:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader.NextResult
member.summary: Advances to the next result set.

member.name: M:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader.IndexByName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the index of a column by its name (case-insensitive). When there are two columns with the same name, the first index will be returned.
member.param: The name of the column to search.

member.name: M:Sem.Data.SprocAccess.FileSystem.TxtReader.Init
member.summary: Reads the text file and initializes the line-pointer.
